mapper.select: SELECT m.memberid, m.membername, m.memberbirthday, m.schoolid, st.studentcode, st.studentgrade, st.studentclass, st.studentnum, st.studentgender, st.studentmajor FROM member m, student st WHERE m.memberid = st.memberid ORDER BY m.memberid
